name: Cantaloper
description:
Cantaloper is a very difficult platformer in which you use your legs to charge jumps and climb out of a deep pit. You'll play as a beautiful cantaloupe with human legs that must ascend out from the underground depths he finds himself in. There are no checkpoints; every fall will set you back based solely on how far you fall. Can you make it up two long levels? Will you elope?

Featuring:

- The sexiest cantaloupe you will ever see

- A long journey to the surface

- Rats

- L I M B S

Made in collaboration with IDislikeNames.
